subSections.title: Etymology 1
subSections.text:
From {{inh|zh|sit-pro|*s-row||egg, nit}}. Cognate with {{cog|bo|སྲོ་མ||egg of a louse, nit, small bubble}}.

{{och-l|鯤}} may represent a doublet resulting from prefix preemption. Compare its variant {{zh-l|𡖉}}.

subSections.title: Etymology 1
subSections.text:
{{wikipedia|lang=ja}} {{wikipedia|Egg}}
{{ja-kanjitab|たまご|yomi=k}}
[[File:Vogeleier.jpg|124px]] [[File:Fried_egg,_sunny_side_up.jpg|123px]]
{{m|ja|卵|tr=tamago}}: a [[selection]] of different '''[[egg]]s'''.
From {{com|ja|sort=たまご|玉|tr1=tama|t1=ball|子|tr2=ko|t2=child, small thing}}. {{ja-rendaku2|ko|go|子|sort=たまご}}
